Crushers

❮ ❯

Dodge, crush, and outlast your opponents! Ram into other vehicles, use special items, and maneuver skillfully to win the SMASHBASH Tournament!

Originally started as a university project completed in just two months, this game has become my personal favourite. My team of passionate game developers and I have decided to continue its development, and more content is coming soon!

My primary roles were in designing game concept, gameplay programming and mechanics design, focusing on the visual effects.

Role

Game Designer, Gameplay Programmer, Player Controller Programmer, Camera Programmer, VFX

Year

2024

Tools/Technology

Unity3D

Collaborators

Chanel Parfait, Anthony Thai, Michael Lam, Belida Ouch, April O'Donnell

Play Crushers
